I was sent here by the Edron {academy} for scientific {researches}. I am also responsible for the magical {education} of the citizens.
The academy of {Edron} as a royal institution has several agendas here. Not all of them are to be discussed with outsiders.
These isles hold more secrets than those that meet the eye. I am convinced that once a great {civilisation} prospered here. Some sort of {disaster} wiped out almost completely any trace of it.
I teach aspiring sorcerers several spells.
Edron is a place of learning, magic and {secrets}. But others are dealing with that already in other places. It is my obligation to handle those issues here.

Magic is not available everywhere at the same strength and intensity. There are areas that are dry like a desert, magically spoken, others are rich of magic. At some places magic flows as strong as if there were springs of magic.
The little we know about the extinct civilisation hints about a magically advanced race of humanoids, possibly of elven heritage, that once inhabited those isles until the disaster struck.

The disaster took place at least some centuries ago. Our researches convinced us that the isles here belonged to a single landmass in the past. That should give you an idea of the extent of this catastrophe.
It would not surprise me much if some superstitious fools mess around with the chaotic magical currents of this isle. Only the gods may know what harm they could do to themselves and others.
The quara are something that is worth some research. Sadly I lack the time and resources for further investigations.
The superstition of the natives pushes this kind of hedge magic. It is intolerable that they are fooling around with powers they don't understand.
I will not discuss this issue now and here. If you have any questions about him, the academy in Edron is the place to ask.
Well, Thais is not the city it used to be. Too many people, too noisy, too dirty.
Those haggling and scheming merchants sometimes give me more shivers than a demon. At least you know what to expect from a demon.
The king's support of the academy is dwindling. I hope results in my researches will change this significantly.
There seems to be some demonic cabal called Triangle of Terror. We don't know anything about its members except that there are three of them.
I heard he is one of the more notorious {pirates}.
Pirates are a constant pest. As long as their existence does not interfere with my researches, I don't care much about them.
